text.name: system_description
text.text: PrBoom is a cross-platform version of the classic 3D first person shooter Doom from id Software. Originally written for Microsoft Windows, PrBoom has since been ported to Linux and many other platforms.

text.name: system_description
text.text: PrBoom es una versión multiplataforma del clásico shooter 3D en primera persona Doom de id Software. Originalmente escrito para Microsoft Windows, PrBoom ha sido portado a Linux y muchas otras plataformas.
